website_summaries.verdict: A coffee full of rich, dark flavor but light enough to not have a bitter or acidic taste. An easy go-to cup of java.
pros: Donut Shop has a smooth, well-balanced flavor that would appeal to both light- and dark-roast lovers
This medium roast pairs well with breakfast
We found the taste is comparable to the classic Dunkin' Donuts coffee
The K-Cups are more full than some, making them even more flavorful
cons: The K-Cups being more full does increase the brewing time

customer_reviews.title: Pods burst at the seam
customer_reviews.text: I have used this brand many times, but this is the first time my order has come with pods all loose in the big box. I don't now what the reason is but this is the only time that I have had them burst at the seam. It has caused a huge mess and even the ones that don't completely burst are leaving grounds in my cup. For future I will make sure that the packaging is in the small 12ct boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Exter

customer_reviews.title: Not as tasty as I expected - tastes like old grounds
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased this brand for a long time, and when I found this deal on Amazon I had to jump on it. However, after going through several k-cups, I am convinced that this is not the same quality that I have purchased in the past. Normally the expiration date is stamped on the bottom of the box, however this box has a label covering it that I cannot remove without pealing off the cardboard (shows Jan 2020) - but I can't confirm if that's the manufacturer date or one added for inventory purposes. Gave 2 stars only for the price and delivery time, however I will not purchase again from here.
customer_reviews.author: Janice S

customer_reviews.title: too blend
customer_reviews.text: Maybe my taste buds have been spoiled but this coffee is very blend. I even put the setting to "strong" and it's still not nearly as good as I expect it to be. You can smell coffee when it's brewed but it tastes like someone water-down your regular Starbucks coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Hegel

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: These come in a large box and are the classic donut shop coffee pods I love. Only weird thing is two have exploded in my machine and got grounds everywhere. I just cleaned the machine and remade the cup though and it was fine. Worth the money if you’re easy going if things don’t always work, I’m almost through the box and it’s only been a couple
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Awful.
customer_reviews.text: I thought my coffeemaker was breaking. But now I know it’s just these pods. I keep getting “Brew Interrupted” messages and then tons of grounds in the coffee. I couldn’t drink it. I was wasting so many pods. They seem to be not compatible or a bad batch. I called keurig and they said the pods seem to be bad. Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.author: Gdog

customer_reviews.title: Beware of the single box 72 count!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the Donut Shop K cups, and I’ve purchased from Amazon several times. The last 2 times I’ve purchased the 72count, the cups arrived in a single large box. The coffee is more dilute and not full of flavor as before. To make sure you’re getting an authentic item, but lease purchase large quantities as packs of individual boxes. There’s a noticeable difference! I thought something was wrong with my Keurig until I realized it’s these defective K cups. AMAZON has 72 count, (12 count, 6 pack) PLEASE PURCHASE THOSE INSTEAD!!!
customer_reviews.author: Valencia

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed with grinds in cup
customer_reviews.text: Every time I order this product from Amazon, the pods come busted or they put tons of grinds into the coffee. I have cleaned my Kureig many times thinking that was the problem and it still happens.
customer_reviews.author: lindsey nelson

customer_reviews.title: Love the coffee but pods explode.
customer_reviews.text: Love this coffee but the pods explode. I have been drinking this coffee for years and the flavor is great. The last two batches of 72 pods that I have received have been defective. I have been able to get a full refund on both purchases which is why I am giving a 4 star rating. Cleaning up the blown up pods is a pain so I don't plan to purchase this coffee again. Purchase at your own risk.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: I love the coffee, but the pods are not constructed very well
customer_reviews.text: Around a year ago I subscribed to the auto-shipment of Donut Shop K-Cup pods on Amazon. The last few shipments I received have had a number of pods that release the grinds into my cup while brewing. This is a problem that has surfaced only over the last few shipments but is enough of an issue where I will be changing my subscription to a different brand. Nothing is worse than getting a mouthful of coffee grinds along with that first sip of the day.
customer_reviews.author: J Whitmoyer

customer_reviews.title: Box the size of a 4 slice toaster
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize it was going to be a giant box with all single serve pods in it thought it was going to be smaller boxes that I could manage easier! Nevertheless it was a good Buy and they are just coffee pods so all is good in the hood!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph T. Schatz

customer_reviews.title: Stay Away From This Brand
customer_reviews.text: I thought my Keurig Coffe machine was on it's last leg while using these pods. I was wrong. Turn's out, it's these K-Cups. They just don't work correctly. If I select a Lg, I'll get a medium size cup. I won't be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Leary

customer_reviews.title: Try the Dark, it’s much better for the same price.
customer_reviews.text: It was great years ago, I bought tons of it but lately the quality has gone down & the price has gone up. I’m done .
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Fresh caffeine for regular coffee people
customer_reviews.text: Nice flavor and fresh smell. Very good for office home for a caffeine guy. I am DD fan and do not have DD around my work. I am big fan of this brand. If you prefer strong coffee like Starbucks, it's not your choice. I don't know why I do not taste natural in Starbucks.
customer_reviews.author: twanke kancho

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: Very good coffee taste. I did have my second K-Cup leave grounds all in my coffee, but I'm about 30 cups deep now and that's the only time that's happened.
customer_reviews.author: damnisthistaken

customer_reviews.title: Faulty tops weak seal around the top
customer_reviews.text: After have 7 kups burst in the keruig, there was no savings for ordering these here. I'll continue to purchase them locally during routine grocery trips.
customer_reviews.author: john salyards

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty sure these are not authentic donut shop pods. Do not give these thieves your money. The pod is different and the taste is off.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer2

customer_reviews.title: Giant box of loose pods?
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised this time yo find a large box of loose pods instead of 6 boxes of 12 pods. I like to take them while traveling, this makes it difficult. Nevertheless, it's great coffee!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Grounds in cup, defective KCups trash coffee
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite coffee, but this last order was not good, the cups leave my coffee full of grounds, making a fun surprise on the way to work every morning
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Man

customer_reviews.title: Our go-to coffeee
customer_reviews.text: After trying several brands, this is what we buy when we can
customer_reviews.author: T. Mos

customer_reviews.title: Good Strong Cup without Being too harsh
customer_reviews.text: This coffee is strong but (unlike a lot of other brands) it doesn't give me tummy issues.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonGuru

customer_reviews.title: Colorado isn’t the place for the book ordering
customer_reviews.text: Love this coffee! The bulk ordering didn’t work. Half the box is depressurized. Blew up in my coffee maker.
customer_reviews.author: Avp1100

customer_reviews.title: Good coffee
customer_reviews.text: Love this coffee it is one of the few coffees the keurig doesn’t make it taste like flavored water.
customer_reviews.author: Techie

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great taste
customer_reviews.text: Could be slightly stronger. My other selects are Peets (Brazil...) and Starbucks.
customer_reviews.author: Francoise Latrelle

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I've tried about every k-cup brand out there, and this by far the best one. Not bitter at all.
customer_reviews.author: tnew

customer_reviews.title: Love this Coffee.
customer_reviews.text: This coffee is our favorite. Highly recommend trying it if you haven't already.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: My Personal Favorite
customer_reviews.text: There are a lot of flavors that are good, but this is my personal favorite.
customer_reviews.author: mrpickem

customer_reviews.title: Coffee
customer_reviews.text: this is my second time ordering the coffee and it has a great taste.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Donut-Shop K Cups
customer_reviews.text: This is truly just like coffee from a donut shop and I am so glad. I have never had a faulty K cup in several orders now.
customer_reviews.author: Herc

customer_reviews.title: Loose in box.
customer_reviews.text: Cartridges loose in brown cardboard box instead of in original product boxes showing freshness date. Will not order again.
customer_reviews.author: Susan W. Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Our favorite
customer_reviews.text: This is our go to coffee. We keep buying over and over
customer_reviews.author: Gfnjr

customer_reviews.title: I'm getting more
customer_reviews.text: The flavor is rich. I like slightly dark coffee because I can taste the flavor mixed with cream or milk, but this coffee I don't need to make it dark to enjoy the flavor. Amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Coffee time
customer_reviews.text: Love this coffee I order it almost all the time
customer_reviews.author: Ada Collazo

customer_reviews.title: My Wife said . “ Buy More” Happy Wife- Happy Life
customer_reviews.text: Taste Good. So my Wife said. I drink Tea. She made me order more....
customer_reviews.author: The Consumers Advocate

customer_reviews.title: This is a very low quality product!
customer_reviews.text: These pods seem to be very low quality. They would not work correctly in mine or my Dad’d Keurig machine. The pods seem to burst/crack and cause grinds to spill into the coffee cups and into the machine parts. This product should not be allowed to be sold on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: poodless K-cups
customer_reviews.text: dislike product description as "pods", because I get and like K-cups. For clarity, I get K-cups, yet description uses the term "PODS'
customer_reviews.author: Joey McCarron, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: It’s not the Keurig messing up, it’s these KCups that are messing up my machine.
customer_reviews.text: These KCups barely work at all. I just purchased a brand new Keurig and thought it was defective because I cannot use these KCups without coffee grounds filling up the bottom of my mug and clogging up the machine. Love the coffee but not worth the hassle. Cancelling this subscription.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen Streck

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Flavor and Aroma
customer_reviews.text: This coffee really hits the spot. It will probably become my go to coffee in the future. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ralf

customer_reviews.title: Lots of annoying coffee grinds in drink
customer_reviews.text: The taste was okay, but I ALWAYS get large amounts of coffee grinds in my drink. Never had this problem before and probably wouldn’t buy this brand of product again.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Don't work in model 15
customer_reviews.text: They will not work in a Keurig model 15. Tried t twice with two different machines. Must be packed too tight
customer_reviews.author: Perry T. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this coffee but have had several k-cups blow out the side and make a huge mess, never had this problem with any other k-cup.
customer_reviews.author: zane danielson

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know if this product is defective, but almost every pod we used blew up in our machine and we ended up with a coffee cup full of coffee grains. Time after time this happened. We cleaned out our machine thinking it was a problem with our Keurig, but the problems continued. Finally bought another box of coffee, and problem was fixed. I’m a pro at cleaning out my machine now, but ended up throwing away half the box. Never again.
customer_reviews.author: Summer Henricksen

customer_reviews.title: Where has this coffee been all my life?
customer_reviews.text: I love this coffee. It's dark but not bitter....wish they offered it in a bag because I'd buy it on the side for when I want the whole pot. Meanwhile, will keep using the K-cups even though I feel guilty using a one-use product. It goes out of stock so if you find a good deal, buy two.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni Wallace

product_meta.title: The Original Donut Shop Keurig Single-Serve K-Cup Pods, Medium Roast Coffee, 72 Count
product_meta.description: Before coffee was complicated great coffee was simply fresh bold and flavorful. The Original Donut Shop Regular single serve K-Cup pods bring back the classic donut companion with this ideally balanced brew of the highest quality beans...dunking is encouraged. Full-flavored and easy going this medium roast blend embodies one of the best things in life - simply great coffee. These single-serve K-Cup pods are compatible with all Keurig K-Cup Pod Single-Serve Coffee Makers and brew up to 12 oz. of The Original Donut Shop Regular coffee each. Each K-Cup pod is filled with the freshest ground coffee and brews a perfect great tasting cup of coffee every time. Certified Orthodox Union Kosher and contains no artificial ingredients.
feature_bullets: Not too harsh not too bitter - just right
Ensure high-quality coffee every time with pods specially designed to work in Keurig brewers with exact grind and extraction
